ygData.subject: RE: reading the FAQ
ygData.msgSnippet: It would be nice if you could highlight the changes somehow.  Not certain if boldface or italics will work with Onelist so maybe just putting NEW prior to
ygData.messageBody:
It would be nice if you could highlight the changes somehow. Not certain if
boldface or italics will work with Onelist so maybe just putting "NEW" prior
to the new stuff can help us old-timers filter out the stuff we've read
before.

Also, whats the story behind the small brass trumpet? I've been out of the
net a lot over the past month so that ones new to me. What mob drops it?

Thanks
Galtin of E'ci


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Talies the Wanderer [SMTP:snicker@...]
> Sent: Friday, December 17, 1999 11:00 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] reading the FAQ
>
> From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
>
> I know a lot of you don't bother to read the FAQ, but if I could encourage
>
> you all to go over it at least once. I have a lot of information on there
>
> that will help with some frequently asked questions (thus the title....),
> as well as a collation of the magical instruments in EQ. I would
> sincerely
> appreciate you higher-levels going over that list with a fine-toothed comb
>
> for me and correcting my booboos.
>
>
